segments.text: Well , I can ’ t believe your uncle and aunt came to stay with us for a week , and they did not even call us in advance .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: John , they are old-fashioned people from the Chinese countryside . That ’ s their custom .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know , but it is hard for me to get used to your relatives coming to visit us , and without warning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t your relatives visit other relatives ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but Americans never visit without calling in advance , and they almost never stay overnight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that maybe Chinese families are closer than your families .
segments.speaker: S2
